name: Chad Lowe
summary:
Chad Lowe. Actor: Unfaithful. Chad Lowe is an American actor, director, and producer.

He was born Charles Davis Lowe II in Dayton, Ohio, to Barbara Lynn (Hepler), a school teacher, and Charles Davis Lowe, a trial lawyer. He is the younger brother of actor Rob Lowe. Chad first appeared opposite Rob in the movie Oxford Blues (1984), in which he played a computer hacker. He quickly followed this up with a...
awards: Won 1 Primetime Emmy | 4 wins & 1 nomination total
